Generation VII.Sun: While grooming itself, it builds up fur inside its stomach. It sets the fur alight and spews fiery attacks, which change based on how it coughs.
Generation VII.Moon: It doesn't allow its emotions to be easily seen. Earning its trust takes time. It prefers solitude.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: If you try too hard to get close to it, it won't open up to you. Even if you do grow close, giving it too much affection is still a no-no.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Its coat regrows twice a year. When the time comes, Litten sets its own body on fire and burns away the old fur.

Generation VIII.Sword: It spends even the smallest amount of downtime grooming its fur with its tongue. Loose fur gathers in its stomach and serves as fuel for fiery moves. *
Generation VIII.Shield: Trying to pet Litten before it trusts you will result in a nasty scratch from its sharp claws. Be careful. *

Generation IX.Scarlet: If you try too hard to get close to it, it won’t open up to you. Even if you do grow close, giving it too much affection is still a no-no.
Generation IX.Violet: While grooming itself, it builds up fur inside its stomach. It sets the fur alight and spews fiery attacks, which change based on how it coughs.

Generation VII.Sun: First partner Pokémon from Hala in Iki Town
Generation VII.Moon: First partner Pokémon from Hala in Iki Town
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: First partner Pokémon from Professor Kukui in Route 1
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: First partner Pokémon from Professor Kukui in Route 1

Generation VIII.Expansion Pass: Reward for finding at least 100 Alolan Diglett (if the player chose Scorbunny )

Generation IX.The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero: Canyon Biome , Chargestone Cavern (after boosting biodiversity in the Canyon Biome)
